title: Fearless Rose
description: Legendary ladies’ man.I want his brave, beautiful heart for myself.He’s fearless, but he has to make a decision ...One that could change all of our lives.I’ve never felt this way before.But I’m not the only one who needs him.And he’s faced with the choice: me or her.Welcome back to Rosehaven Academy.This is a mature new adult high school series and contains situations that some readers might find offensive.This book is book 2 of a duet. The final duet of the series releases October and December 2021.
author: Leila James
